name: OverDrive infinite
description:
This is a high octane FPS shooter and only the elite gamers can survive!

Thank you to Neo Nomen because I used the Karlson tralier OST music in my game, which I then remixed so it will fit in my game better!  :)

Link to the Karlson trailer music that Neo Nomen created!

There is an issue with the game were when you start it, the game will bring you to the "You lose" screen and I can't find the mistake in my code, so just press "Play again" on the screen to start and once I find the mistake, I will release an update to the game.    :P
